You never heard about Portal, never played it? Are you even from this planet? This game just can't receive negative review..just can't..There can't be a person, who would just not enjoy that chill play where you have plenty time to solve puzzles, while Glados just making jokes on you with her just perfectly matching voice. Once you hear that voice you never forget it and never erase it from head. This game is just something totally different than others games..everyone can play it..even your parents...that's how easy this game is to finish it. You will not lose any braincells don't worry...well maybe..depends if you not be that crazy person as me, which before this game played Hotline Miami and find that he love to get all those crazy achievements..and that he actually really enjoy it. So once i find, Portal have achievements aswell (which is kinda suprise since this game is kinda old) and its super challenging to finish it i must of course have those icons on profile for sure ! Once you finish this game, there are challenges puzzles, which are not that easy to solve and you will spend some time to make those runs perfect ! Well luckily there is save option on this challenges, so will you just try..screw it up, load and try again...and if you patient enough soon or later you will eventually get them. Depends of course how handy you are :D Well i must recommend this game, it's history masterpiece and every gamer which exist should have this game checked on they're games list. For you guys..which are achievements focus hunter like me is must have! With Regards newbie achievements hunter :)
Fantastic game, great storytelling, good humor, fun puzzles, all you could ever ask for. Honestly if you haven’t played the game already I suggest giving it a try.

Finally gotten around to playing this after all the great reviews I've heard. 

This is NOT a first-person shooter, but a first person platformer. Must play for anyone who loves puzzle solving!

The atmosphere, environment, mechanics of the game all make it very unique as a platformer especially of its age.  

This is without a doubt the must unsettling puzzle game I've ever played. Good job whoever came up with this.
Amazing and amazing and amazing game!

This was a triumph.
I'm making a note here:
huge success.
It's hard to overstate
My satisfaction.
Aperture Science.
We do what we must
Because we can.
For the good of all of us.
Except the ones who are dead.

But there's no sense crying
Over every mistake.
You just keep on trying
Till you run out of cake.
And the Science gets done.
And you make a neat gun.
For the people who are
Still alive.

I'm not even angry.
I'm being so sincere right now.
Even though you broke my heart.
And killed me.
And tore me to pieces.
And threw every piece into a fire.
As they burned it hurt because
I was so happy for you!
Now these points of data
Make a beautiful line.
And we're out of beta.
We're releasing on time.
So I'm glad. I got burned.
Think of all the things we learned
For the people who are
Still alive.

Go ahead and leave me.
I think I prefer to stay inside.
Maybe you'll find someone else
To help you.
Maybe Black Mesa...
THAT WAS A JOKE, HA HA, FAT CHANCE.
Anyway this cake is great
It's so delicious and moist
Look at me still talking when there's science to do
When I look out there
It makes me GLaD I'm not you
I've experiments to run
There is research to be done
On the people who are
Still alive.

And believe me I am still alive
I'm doing science and I'm still alive
I feel FANTASTIC and I'm still alive
While you're dying I'll be still alive
And when you're dead I will be still alive
Still alive
Still alive.

Portal es un excelente juego de puzzles; tiene una jugabilidad sencilla y  la dificultad adecuada, aunque también cuenta con algunos mapas y desafíos extras que pueden ser un reto. La historia no relata muchos detalles y la duración del juego es corta (estos aspectos fueron enriquecidos en Portal 2), pero los comentarios de GlaDOS hacen que la experiencia sea más divertida y los mapas de bonificación te brindarán algunas horas adicionales de juego o frustración (en algunos mapas). Altamente recomendado, especialmente si lo compras junto a Portal 2 y en oferta.
It's a little short, but every hour I spent on it was very satisfying! Great game!
